Package org.example.GUI.gamestates

Class JouerTuile

java.lang.Object
org.example.GUI.gamestates.State
org.example.GUI.gamestates.JouerTuile
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateInterface
public class JouerTuile extends State implements StateInterface
The JouerTuile class represents the game state for playing tuiles (tiles) in the game. It handles the selection and usage of tuiles, as well as interactions with game elements such as boats, sharks, whales, and serpents.

    • mouseClicked

      public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e)
      Handles mouse click events in the game state for playing tuiles. It checks for the position of the mouse click and performs appropriate actions based on the selected tuile.
